Lumpy skin disease: Farmers demand vaccines and reject culling
subhead: After vaccination zones and a protection zone were implemented in the Occitanie region of southern France, concern is now growing in the Aveyron. The department, home to 500,000 cattle, has the largest herd in the region, with half of them being the Aubrac breed.

Putin's readiness to speak with Macron 'welcome,' says French presidency
subhead: The Elysée stressed, however, that any discussion with Russia would be conducted in 'full transparency' with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky and European allies.

title: Football world rallies for release of journalist detained in Algeria
subhead: As Christophe Gleizes, a reporter for So Press sentenced to seven years in prison, marks six months behind bars, the French Football Federation  is spotlighting his case during the round of 64 of the Coupe de France, taking place from December 19 to 21.

title: Santa Claus in France is a temp worker: 'It helps make ends meet'
subhead: Retirees, actors, entrepreneurs: They don the role of Santa Claus in shopping malls, at Christmas markets or via video calls for private customers. Few people rush to apply for this job, which sometimes involves difficult working conditions, although the most experienced among them still appreciate it.

title: Morocco faces 'obligation' to win AFCON 2025 and deliver flawless tournament
subhead: As favorites, the Atlas Lions take on Comoros on Sunday, December 21, in the opening match of the Africa Cup of Nations. This tournament serves as a test ahead of the 2030 World Cup, which Morocco will co-host with Spain and Portugal.

subhead: French authorities issued on Friday a decree authorizing the Swiss multinational to operate the Perrier springs in Vergèze, southern France.

title: 'The Gospel is a bombshell. 'Love your neighbor' is such a radical message': Charlotte's conversion to Catholicism
subhead: 'Changing Faith' (1/11). Why do people choose a particular religion? Charlotte, a 23-year-old philosophy student in Paris, embraced Christianity as a teenager, but maintains her distance from the Church as an institution. She recounts her spiritual journey.

title: Trump dogged by cost of living crisis and Republican revolt
subhead: The US president tried to defuse Americans' dissatisfaction with the economy in a televised address on Wednesday. He continued to blame Joe Biden, but struggled to grasp the extent of the issue – provoking tensions within his own party.
